Alert Name: bush
Fannie, Freddie assigned a watchful eye
House passes a bill that will require an independent regulator to oversee the mortgage giants.
05/22/07 04:24 PM, EDT
The U.S. House passed a bill Tuesday tightening federal oversight of Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac, the nation's two largest purchasers and guarantors of home mortgages.
